attributes.action: Allow use of fireworks on only Bonfire Night (BN) or the Saturday of BN events
attributes.additional_details: We need to be mindful about animal welfare. This can great disturbing and distressing situations for some to the extent that dogs or other animals are having to be taken elsewhere or medicated.
attributes.background: My dog is highly distressed when fireworks are going off! It seems unnecessary to drag bonfire night celebrations on for two weeks and therefore should be limited to a sole day!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700537
